title: Summon Holies
data:
{{version028}}
{{Flavour|Calls forth divine warriors to aid the caster.}}

'''Summon Holies''' is a monsters-only spell which summons 1-8 of the following [[holy]] creatures, with the following weightings<ref>{{source ref|0.28.0|mon-cast.cc|5978}}</ref>:
*{{monsterlink|Angel}} (43.3%)
*{{monsterlink|Cherub}} (34.6%)
*{{monsterlink|Daeva}} (21.6%)
*{{monsterlink|Ophan}} (0.4%)

{{monsters with spell}}

Seraphim can sustain at most four creatures summoned by this spell. Even though they can summon twice as many allies at once, most of them disappear in a few turns due to the summoning cap.

==History==
*Summon Holies returned as a spell on seraphim in [[0.16]].
*[[Blessed toe]]s could cast Summon Holies prior to their removal in [[0.12]].
*Prior to [[0.12]], the list of possible summons included [[spirit]]s, [[shedu]], and [[Paladin (monster)|paladins]].
*Prior to [[0.10]], the spell could summon a [[silver star]], [[phoenix]], or [[apis]].
